page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: Lots of people need things to do with spare time.Children have hobbies such as tap or modern dancing. They sometimes continue their hobbies as careers when they're older. Lot's of children like sporty hobbies such as Rounders, Netball, Hockey and Football.Most children like collecting things for a hobby like postcards badges and stamps. Some people learn to play music for a hobby. Lots of children go for horse riding lessons.Higher Bowden is a riding school. It's got quite a lot of land, it's got about 20 horses.The riding school's teacher employ's about 10 people to help. Lot's of people go there to ride.There's a school out side for you to learn.You go out on the moor and along the road.
